video.title: America Declassified
video.synopsis: Scientific tests and forensic tools help shed light on some of America's most secretive locations, like heavily guarded compounds and massive bunkers.

episodes.synopsis: Investigate strange sightings at Denver's newest airport; put a pair of Internet rumors to the test; and see where the NSA's collected data is stored.
episodes.title: Denver Airport Bunker, NSA Data

episodes.synopsis: Re-examine JFK's assassination with a sniper test in Dealey Plaza; explore a nuclear waste dump; and visit the U.S. National Radio Quiet Zone.
episodes.title: JFK 50th and Quiet Zone

episodes.synopsis: Explore links between John Wayne's death and a nuclear test site; investigate rumors of cannibalism in Jamestown; and pay a visit to Pensmore mansion.
episodes.title: Cancer, Pensmore, Jamestown

episodes.synopsis: Revisit hijacker D.B. Cooper's daring getaway; see a toxic sinkhole that's swallowing a town; and investigate a controversial wild horse roundup.
episodes.title: D.B. Cooper, Missing Mustangs

episodes.synopsis: Peer into James "Whitey" Bulger's infamous hideout; recount a small town's destruction by fire; and visit a mysterious South Florida rock formation.
episodes.title: Whitey Bulger Capture and More

episodes.synopsis: Tour a luxury doomsday condo complex built in a former Cold War missile silo, and attempt an infamous escape from Alcatraz via a homemade raft.
episodes.title: Missile Silos & Alcatraz

episodes.synopsis: Test less lethal weapons with an ex-CIA officer; explore tunnels underneath Las Vegas; and investigate Internet rumors that recycling is a hoax.
episodes.title: Less Lethal, Trash Talk

episodes.synopsis: Revisit the assassination of Martin Luther King Jr. via new ballistics tests, and search the sky for the truth behind Texas's mysterious Marfa lights.
episodes.title: MLK Conspiracy

episodes.synopsis: Pore over Area 51 files with Kari Byron of "Mythbusters"; try to outrun police drones in Texas; and tour some of California's medical marijuana farms.
episodes.title: Open Area 51 Files

episodes.synopsis: A behind-the-scenes roundup offers more on the 1962 Alcatraz escape; radioactive leaks; and the theory that hijacker D.B. Cooper buried his cash.
episodes.title: Behind-the-Scenes Peeks
